projects.title: Realtime Reddit Hate Speech Detection System
projects.description: Full-stack data pipeline to detect, categorize, and visualize hate speech on Reddit in real time using advanced NLP techniques. Using Transformers models for multi-label classification, sentiment analysis, and complete ETL pipeline with Kafka and Elasticsearch

ETL pipeline using Kafka and Elasticsearch
